reviews.comments: This was a great place to stay for a couple of day's

The place was a great find! The sea view and proximity to the beach makes this a prime location, not  only for scenery but the apartment is awesome! The decor, jacuzzi, cleanliness and atmosphere was perfect!
Very very nice apartment!

The location is very good, and the apartment is very nice. The only issue we had is that they allow people to smoke in the apartment, and all the windows were closed and it was very suffocating although I sent a message to the host a few days before to ask to open the windows before we arrive so that the apartment will air out. We had to open all windows and get out of the apartment for a few hours before we could even breathe in there.
Highly recommended ,,
אחלה מקום הדירה ממש יפה הגקוזי ממש גדול אהבנו ממש נירא אפילו יותר טוב מאשר בתמונות בעל המקום ממש נחמד ממליצה בחום

החדר היה מלוכלך בבנין מוזנח. התמונות לא מספרות את כל האמת..
הכניסה לבנין והבניין עצמו פשוט מדכא, זה לא מקום להתפנק בלשון המעטה..
בחדר היו כוסות בארון כשסמרטוט מטונף מונח בתחתיתם...החלונות והזכוכיות מלוכלכים ומתחת למצעים המגן היה מלא כתמים....לא מזמין במיוחד.
reviews.response:
אתה אדם מגעיל שניסה לברוח ללא תשלום
ניסית לרמות אותי ואת rBnb
נכנסת לנכס בשעה 16:00 ושלחת הודעה ל rbnb על ביטול ההזמנה ועידכנת שאתה לא מגיע ובסופו של דבר הגעתם נשארתם בנכס
באופן מלא ללא שום תלונה או בקשה
(כי הרי אתה לא משלם אז מה אכפת לך)
יצאת למחרת כמו גנב מבלי לעדכן את rbnb
שהחלטת להישאר
ואני הייתי צריך להוכיח להם באמצעות מצלמות אבטחה חיצוניות ששהית בנכס בשביל שהם ידאגו לקחת ממך תשלום
אתה ישראלי מכוער שניסה לברוח בצורה נוראית
אבל הכעס שלך שלא הצלחת גומר אותך
אני במקומך מוריד את הראש ומתבייש
ועם החדר היה כל כך נורא
וגם ככה הודעת על ביטול
אז למה שהית בנכס
למה נשארת עד למחרת
רק בגלל שחשבת שהצלחת לרמות את המערכת
אתם צריכים להתבייש

reviews.comments: מיקום מדהים, גישה ישירה לחוף ויציאה לכל מקום כמעט מעניין בחיפה

היה מושלם, הסויטה מהממת ומפנקת, ג׳קוזי נקי, שירותים ומקלחת נקיים, טלויזיה עם שירותי ערוצים יוטיוב וכו… אבי פירגן לנו צק אין מוקדם יותר.
מיקום מעולה על הים.
בקרבת סופרמרקט, חניה בשפע.
מומלץ
מקום מעולה, מעוצב ברמה גבוהה וכיף להתארח ..
סוויטה מהממת על חוף הים עם גקוזי ענק דירה מאוד נקייה וחדשה,בדיוק כמו בתמונה,מומלץ בחום

המקום היה מהמם, בדיוק כמתואר בתמונות ובתיאור. אבי היה איתנו בקשר צמוד בכניסה שלנו למקום, ותמיד היה זמין מאז, לכל בקשה שלנו.
המקום והיחס האישי סיפקו את כל הצרכים שלנו לשהייה מושלמת. השירות היה מצוין! ממליצים בחום!

להתרק!!!! עקב כל מה שנרשם להתרחקקק

לא מקום לזוגות.

באותו לילה ביום שישי 10 בלילה חזרתי מחיפה חזרה לבאר שבע בגלל מקום מגעיל ואדם אנטיפט.
הבת זוג שלי עברה את סוף יום ההולדת שלה בבכי!!!!!
reviews.response:
נאור אתה דוגמה מצוינת לישראלי המכוער
ואפילו להרבה יותר מזה
הגעת לנכס במקום ב 17:00 בשעה 21:00 בערך
ביקשת לפנות יותר מאוחר ומאוד הפריע לך שיש תוספת תשלום
חיפשת כל דרך אפשרית לקבל פיצוי
המצאת שטויות על דורקס שכנראה הבאת איתך כשיטת מצליח לקבל פיצוי
נכנסת למקום חדש
התלונה שלך היתה שהרצפה עוד רטובה מהשטיפה ושיש דורקס פליי
שהאמת אין לי מושג מזה
אבל בשיחה איתך מובן בהחלט שאתה מכיר את זה דיי טוב
להבנתי זה סוג של שמן בחירה גרועה לקבלת פיצוי (בנינו היית צריך לבחור משהו אחר שמן זה לא אסון )
התלוננת שרטוב זה בסדר זכותך
לצעוק ליד שכנים אנשים מבוגרים ליד ילדים
״מקום של זונות של נערות ליווי״
זה מכוער מאוד ומראה בדיוק מי אתה וזה לא משנה כמה אתה כועס
ביקשת לבטל את ההזמנה והסכמתי
ביקשת את כספך
ואמרתי לך שמבחינתי כל שקל שיכנס אליי תקבל חזרה
אני לא מעוניין באנשים כמוך
ובכסף שלך אתה יכול להשכיר חדר ללילה
אבל אתה לא קנית את המקום או את הבנין
וגם עם היית קונה יש דרכך להתנהג
בעלי סוויטות ונכסים תחשבו טוב לפני שתאשרו
לשיפוטכם

reviews.comments: מקום נקי משופץ ברמה גבוהה

name: ❤️GermanColony🔥luxuriously designed&comfy
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper

description: It's particulary gratifying when you return to it, worn-out and after a day of exploring the ins and outs of the city and its surroundings. A HOME, that will definitely load you up with fresh and enlivening energy.Centrally located only 60 m' from the Bahai Gardens.You'll have a hard time leaving this elegant modern and beautiful apartment.The spaceMy deceased parantes Eleonora and Herman loved hosting people, this apartment was always full of guests. They were known for their generousity and their kind hearts. I miss them a lot. For more than 2 years this apartment was empty, I could not touch it. I recently renovated this apartment, designed it and made it modern, elegant, beautiful and  very cosy. It is very clean, and welcoming, I'm sure they would have loved it, as all our guests and visitors told. This is my Airbnb apartment, which I personally care for with all my heart.Guest accessall parts exept one cupboard which is a storage space for the apartment like soaps, towels, tools etcOther things to noteThis apartment is in a very good condition, it's aesthetic, clean and welcoming. I am going to be availiable to whatever questions that arises. In the apartment there is a house manual available which gives all the needed information to enjoy your stay. Upon request the manual can be sent.
additional_house_rules:
When you leave home pls switch off the electrical appliances to avoid high expenses. 
We expect our guests to treat our home with care  and leave it clean and neat for our next guests, especially when long term guest are hosted. 
It's very important to us that our guest are considerate to our neighbours and that they do not play loud music or or tv.
Quiet hours are between 23:00 - 08:00 
Pls. No moving furniture or redesigning the apartment. Israeli guests, Please be aware as israeli law requires you must add 17% VAT.
All other guests must provide a custom border ticket photo or a passport photo so they can avoid adding 17% VAT.
interaction: I will be available to questions or needed information and if I can I will socialize with them
transit: Public transport, i.e. bus and Sherut taxi to all directions just in fron of the apartment.

reviews.comments: So nice and helpful. Place was clean and super comfortable

Perfect location to walk to everything (restaurants, cafes, grocery, etc.). The place is beautifully decorated, clean and comfortably fit our family of four. Josepha is a caring and attentive host. Would definitely return.
Great location! Josephine was prompt and very helpful. I recommend this place if you are traveling to Haifa.

Fantastic location just a few steps from the Baha’i Gardens. I was impressed with the bouquet of fresh flowers awaiting me on arrival. Easy self check-in process and thorough communication that also allowed for not needing to carry the key around town. Very clean. I would absolutely stay at Josephine’s place again next time in Haifa!

Josephine was a wonderful host. She helped a great deal with my travels when my health suddenly declined. She went above and beyond to make sure everything went as smooth as possible for me. Excellent hospitality, clean space, walking distance to the Shrine.
Perfect Location, clean & very responsive caring host.

Josephine is thoughtful , fantastic and helpful host.
The place was sparkling clean and tidy with her very nice touch.
She prepared a crib with all what is needed for our baby, including toys.
The place is in a great location with a walking distance to the German colony. Josephine made our life so much easier by giving us a local tip of a parking lot close to the apartment.
She is very responsive and quick yet she gives space in very elegant way.
She was very generous leaving us wine, bread, fruits, milk, chocolate and even a food pouch for our baby.
For us Josephine is a super host and we recommend her place.
Great apartment, amazing location steps away from Bahai gardens and several restaurants, etc. Great place to stay in Haifa and would definitely stay here again.

The apartment is very bright, clean and roomy with great amenities. Location is ideal; just one block from the lower terrace of the Bahai Gardens and next to German colony. We spent three nights there and it was so nice to come to this comfortable space after each of the long days out. Josephine was a very good host; very responsive; would check in with us regularly to make sure everything ok. We spent 13 days in Israel
One caveat is that the apartment is in a multi-story building and is not well marked; so have to communicate well prior to check in to find.

Josephine's lovely apartment is just steps from the base of the terrace gardens to the Bahai shrine, and nearby many great restaurants in the German Colony neighborhood. She is such a kind, generous, responsive host. Very best!

Apartment was very clean and in a really great location. The apartment is set back from the street so it was also very quiet. Josepha even surprised us with candles and challah when she found out we were kosher; it was very appreciated. We had a very pleasant stay; it's clear that Josepha takes great pride in taking care of her family apartment and values making it available to guests.
For Baha'i travelers of 2 or 3 this place is perfect. The location is a very short walk from the bottom terraces, and close to Ben Gurion for easy access to restaurants.

Excellent apartment.
We were 5 - 2 adults and 3 children.
2 bedrooms + living room
1 sleeping in the living room
Winning position. Close to restaurants and tourist sites.
The apartment itself is beautiful, tastefully decorated, rear and quiet.
Hosts are available and helpful.
Wonderful experience!
reviews.response: נהניתי לארח אותם, משפחה מקסימה כולכם. תודה שבחרתם בנו. בריאות לכולם

reviews.comments:
Josephine is a super host. The Apartment exceeded our expectations in terms of cleanliness, location, and amenities.
Thanks a lot ❤️

Fantasitc stay at Josephine's. Location is perfect for exploring the city and getting in/and of Haifa (just a 15 minute walk to the train station). Right in the German Colony with all its restaurants. Fully renovated apartment with 2 bedrooms - it has everything that you would possibly need for a comfortable stay. Josephine went far and beyond to make sure we felt welcome. We will definitely stay again when we are back to visit the beautiful Haifa.

We enjoyed our visit very much.
The place is amazing and in a great location.
The place was crystal clean and Josepha made sure that all our requests are fulfilled before our arrival so that our experience will be as smooth as possible.
Also we really liked all the small touches that Josepha has put into the apartment before our visit.
The cribs we asked were extra cushy, warm and inviting, there were toys lying ready for the kids to play and other such small gestures that indicate that the host cares and does this with love.
Josepha is super responsive with an average response time of maybe 1 minute before and during our visit.
She is super helpful and makes you feel comfortable to reach her for anything.
She also gave us a lot of recommendations about things that we can do in the area.
This is the best Airbnb experience I had so far and I'm using airbnb often.
I absolutely recommend.
Amazing hospitality ! Out and beyond our expectations to make us feel comfortable
Josepha is the best ever host I have seen. Everything is thought in the details. Great location, the apartment is cosy and perfectly sparkling.  We have spent a wonderful trip in this place.
reviews.response: Thank you so much for being such fabulous guests and for leaving the apartment so clean and neat. It was a pleasure coming back to it.

reviews.comments: If you need a place to stay in Haifa look no further! Josepha is a wonderful host - very open communicator and keen that her guests enjoy their stay offering tips and recommendations and seeking out any information requested. Lovely apartment, spotlessly clean and great location.
reviews.response: Thank you very very much you’re a lovely family

reviews.comments:
Spontaneously we arranged a vacation in Haifa and Giuseppe's apartment immediately caught our eye. Renovated, spacious, in a great location, pleasant terrace. Giuseppe answered quickly and was kind in her answers and answered all our questions, a family with two toddlers. She took care of every detail, that the children would be safe, pleasant, fun and protected.
When we arrived we saw new dolls, games, a set for food, everything new in preparation for us. Protected electrical outlets and moved the fragile and delicate furniture to another room,
So that our children will have a safe play space. We really appreciate the thought and investment!
Thank you!

Lovely apartment, everything very new. Conveniently located for visiting at the Italian Hospital, and right next door to the Baha'i gardens.

Josepha is a kind and attentive host who really looks after her guests. I warmly recommend both her and her apartment.

Such a lovely place, it has everything you could need and a great location between the gardens, German Colony & market. It was super clean and spacious. Josephine was an outstanding host with lots of great recommendations. We really enjoyed our stay.
Fully equipped, spacious  apartment in a great location.  The host is quick to respond, helpful with suggestions, and helped make a special stay. Highly recommended !
Wonderful hospitality, proximity to Baha’i Gardens, excellent stay, good kitchen and very comfortable

This place is the perfect bnb from where you can enjoy the beautiful city of Haifa. The apartment has everything you need. Kitchen with all the accessories, coffee with capsules, washing machine, amazing balcony. The host is super helpful and a quick responder. The location of the apartment is 300 hundred meters from the German colony.
Great value and location, close to the port and all tourist attractions. Awesome find!
Great stay

Josephine’s place is a perfect way to stay in Haifa. It is close to everything, near to shops, galleries and all that the German Colony has to offer.  Josephine takes good care to ensure that your stay is comfortable on every level.
Great location in the heart of the action. If your visiting on Baha’i pilgrimage it is only a few steps away from the bottom terraces.
This is my second time at this place, and I shall return each time I am in Haifa.
Comfortable, great atmosphere, sparkling clean, well organized, in a central location, yet quiet and calm. And great hospitality too.
Amazing place and amazing host

Wonderful place with really authentic interior, Josepha was really friendly and helped me with every question, its also a really nice area directly at the beautiful Baha'i Gardens Haifa, a supermarket, many restaurants and a very good bakery is also near by. I really enjoyed my stay and would love to come back again.
We spent a wonderful time in Josephine home. Everything was perfect. The apartment is very clean and nice decorated. We felt like home. Highly recommended!
Very nice, clean, spacious and luxurious apartment in a perfect location! Josepha makes you feel at home straight away and there wasn't a single problem with anything. Highly recommendable!

Highly recommended !!!

I felt very comfortable in the Appartement from Josephena.
Location 5 Stars, everything is in walking distance.
The Kitchen is very good and has everything you need, i liked the big refrigerator with the freezer.
I also enjoyed the porch very much when it’s warm and sunny. If you want to stay inside, than you’ll can watch Netflix at a 55inch tv.
And don’t forget the lovely host Josephena, she is very kind and always available.
Thank you for the great time i had in this apartment.

הגענו לדירה שהיתה במקום מדהים, בקושי הזזנו את האוטו, הכל היה במרחק הליכה.
הבית היה פשוט מדהים. נקי ומאובזר ועשה חשק להיות בו.
וכמובן יוספה שדאגה לנו מהרגע שהזמנו את הדירה והיתה מדהימה.
אין לי ספק שנחזור לשם שוב (ושוב)

הכל היה מושלם, בעלת הבית הציעה רעיונות לבילוי ועשתה הכל כדי להנעים את השהות.
תודה רבה.

תודה לג'וזפה על הדירה המקסימה שהתראחנו בה לא מזמן . היא דעגה
על כל פרט הקטן שתייר יכול להזדקק. דירה סופר נקייה ,עם מטבח מאובזר ,פטיו חמוד עם נדנדה,מזגן בכל חדר ,פרטיות ושקט
למרות מקום המרכזי .
קרוב לרוב בתי קפה ומסעדות,גנים הבהיים,נסיעה קצרה למנזר סטלה מאריס,שוק ואדי 5 דקות הליכה.
ואיך לא להזכיר פה את ג'יוזפה המהממת ,איכפטית שדעגה לנו ולבנות שלנו. שנחזור לחיפה,רק אצלה ⁦❤️⁩
reviews.response: תודה רבה משפחה מקסימה. לא לשכוח, מגיע לכם ממני יום נוסף. עלי!

reviews.comments:
היינו זוג + ילד בן 3 והיה מקום לכולנו בחדר + יש חדר נוסף שלא השתמשנו בו. דירה מרוהטת, יפה, מיקום מעולה ולא רועש מידי במושבה הגרמנית.
שירותיות גבוהה מאוד של המארחת! היה מקסים!

אצל ג"וזפין, תוכלו לצפות למה שהתמונות מראות,,,ואפילו לעוד קצת.
מלבד היופי והאסטטיות של המקום, יש נה ג"וזפין עצמה, שכמו רק ממתינה שהאורחים יפנו אליה, יביעו מה נחוץ להם , יבואו אליה עם בקשות. היא זמינה כל הזמן, למעשה. היא פותרת בעיות והיא מאוד מאוד יעילה.
השילוב הזה של דירה יפה מאוד מושקעת פלוס ג"וזפין כמארחת, הופכים את הבחירה הזאת לבחירה מצויינת. באמת, אולי הכי טובה שיש.

Äußerst sauberes und gut ausgestattetes Appartement in zentraler Lage von Haifa. Die Besitzerin ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit, sie steht für Fragen jederzeit zur Verfügung und ist äußerst kinderfreundlich. Sehr zu empfehlen!
reviews.response: Thank you so much!

reviews.comments: Joséphine est une hote incroyable, elle se soucie du bien être et du bonheur de son voyageur.

amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper

description: This delightfully modern beachfront studio is in a modern building across Carmel Beach, overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It offers all the comforts of a hotel stay but with the convenience of a private apartment. It’s mainly favoured by couples and honeymooners due to its ambience, immediate proximity to the beach, safety, comfort, premium amenities, and easy access to landmarks such as the Haifa Port, Carmel Mountain National Park, and Bahá’í World Centre.The spaceThe fully air-conditioned studio wows with its thoroughly modern interiors and highly functional furnishings. The queen-sized bed in the sleeping nook is draped in premium linen. There’s an open-plan kitchen equipped with hot plate, top freezer refrigerator, Nespresso machine, and kitchen essentials.The bathroom has a shower, bathtub, and complimentary toiletries by L'Occitane en Provence. Bathrobes and slippers are other premium perks available, in addition to all the hotel-standard amenities that define the Master home from home experience. You’ll have a coffee machine with selected coffee blends, free Wi-Fi, 43″ HDTV with unlimited international channels, safety deposit box, washing machine, and more. The studio is fully bathed in natural light and offers beguiling views of the Mediterranean Sea from its oversized sleeping area windows.*There will be additional mandatory fee for Israeli citizens - 17% VAT as per law*Guest accessGuests have access to the building, apartment, and the free parking zone outside.Other things to noteThe Haifa Beach Studio Sea View Apartments by Master is the perfect enclave for two. We have a strict no-smoking policy. No pets allowed and please note that the studio is not suitable for infants under 2 years of age. The apartment is across the Carmel Beach, and close to iconic Haifa attractions. Ask the concierge for details. Ben Gurion Airport (IATA: TLV) is 112 kilometres away on the fastest route.
additional_house_rules:
One of the guests must be at least 30 years of age for check-in.
No parties and lowed noise allowed at all time
Suitable for children under 12 & infants under 2
Pets allowed upon request and approval
No smoking
interaction: Our customer support and private concierge services are available around the clock to make your stay in Haifa as stress-free and memorable as you deserve. We are locals, deeply familiar with the main tourist landmarks but also with off-the-beaten-path attractions. Ask us anything!

reviews.comments: great!
Eden's place was very nice.  Great access to the city of Akko.  Check in/Check out were very easy.  Eden was very great to communicate with.

The beautiful view to the peaceful and clean apartment were key components to us having a beautiful trip in the great city of Akko. Eden was of great help and deserves 5 stars for his outstanding hospitality.
Eden was a great host and the property was amazing!
Nice brand new building, very close to a nice beach. Good communication.

We stayed 4 nights at Eden's place. Overall a good value. Check in would have been very good if they had advised there was a gate into the complex but they provided no remote to raise the gate. That needs to be remedied.  Overall the space is good and the location is good.  Some basic upgrades like some hooks in the bedrooms and bathrooms, towel bars, shower curtains would be helpful.  Then, more attention to detail such as replacing the broken leg on the end table in the bedroom, putting light bulbs in all the lamps, batteries in the TV remotes would also be helpful. Overall, a good stay but with some details worked out would be very good.

The apartment is located in a newly-built complex of 6+ high rising houses. These houses are quite outside of the city of Acre, there are no cafes or restaurants close by (except for the ones at the beach). It takes about (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes to get to the Old City by foot, and about 5 minutes to go to the beach.
The apartment is generally clean (except for stained blankets and a ceiling that is flaking off in one of the bathrooms) and is suited for max. 4 people (if they all share one wardrobe). It's great to have two bathrooms!
We did not meet the host in person, communication was exclusively via (Hidden by Airbnb) . When we noticed that there is no blow dryer (contrary to what is said in the description), a lady came by the next day and brought us a new one.
The balcony faces a busy highway, but if you look around the corner you can see the sea. If you want to sleep with open windows, you will hear the highway clearly in the morning.
Generally, we were pleased with the apartment since there was a lot of space in the living room for us 5.

reviews.comments: הכל היה נפלא.  החדר בתמונה גדול יותר ממה שהוא בפועל

החדר יותר קטן ממה שמצופה מהתמונות, אבל מספיק.
המיטה נוראית ממליצים להחליף מזרן דחוף, הוא נורא ישן ומרגישים את זה.
המצעים היו נקיים ונעימים.
והמקלחת לא נוחה, חסר מתלה לדוש שיהיה נוח להתקלח.
חוץ מזה היה נחמד,יש פרטנר בטלויזיה, יש מים חמים למקלחת וקומקום ומכונת אספרסו.
המיקום של הדירה מושלם, עוברים כביש ומגיעים לטיילת.
הכניסה לדירה קצת קריפית, יש קוד לבנין, קוד לדלת נוספת ולבסוף דלת החדר. הבניין עצמו ישן. אבל המיקום ממש טוב ויש חנייה .
אבי היה זמין וענה מהר.
ממליצים רק להחליף מזרן.

description: Beautiful one bedroom apartment located in the sea side of kibbutz Hahotrim. fantastic sea and Mountain View’s and minutes walk to the beach. reviews.comments: My stay at Dolev place was great, very calming and clean. I would definitely come again.

The location is perfect- the closest house to the beach.

The apartment is spotless- very clean and comfortable. Very nice balcony with sea view and cool breeze during the hottest hours.

The kitchen is fully equipped and you can cook if you wish.

The people of the kibbutz are so friendly and always smiling.

But of course, the main event is obviously the beach, which is 200 meters away. Its actually a nature reserve so no beach amenities and also no lifeguard services, so be aware.
But... You have the entire beach to yourself... There are hours in which we were the only people there... If you are looking for peace and quiet, this is the place.
The apartment was great, extremely close to a quiet and clean beach, and also a short drive away from nice places for hikes.

My second time here.
I had such a pleasant stay. Lovely and well equipped apartment, with a great balcony and very good location.
The perfect gateway

We had a great time.
The place was very nice, quiet, clean & comfortable (we were a couple + 3 year old girl).
Anat was very nice and hospitable. The apartment had everything we needed and more, and its location is amazing - within 4 minutes walk from the beach.
Great place to stay by the sea

The most spacious, airy, and beautiful apartment we've stayed in! Lovely setting in a shady garden. Anat was helpful and responsive. However, it was noisy. Please note that the balcony, which faces the sea, is shared with an adjacent apartment, and the walls between the two apartments are thin. Also, the train tracks and highway are nearby. Running the fan and/or AC was helpful.
Great place
The place is great located in 15 minutes from Haifa and only few minutes walking from a private beach. The room was very clean with noticeable small additions that made the stay  very comfortable
Wonderful beach nearby. The apt. Is clean and specious and anat was kind and responsive. We had good time. Thank you.

A very nice place to stay:) That said, be aware that there is no washer even though it is listed as one of the amenities - we stayed for over a week and were counting on there being a washing machine. Otherwise, it really is a super close walk to a pretty beach, nice TV, good kitchen and quiet area in a kibbutz.
A very warm and clean apartment, with everything you need. Anat even had a bed for our baby. The location is wonderful: 4 minutes walk to a sort of private beach. Really great for surfers!

easy check in
close to beach
quick and easy communication
clean
close to take away food
a pleasure..will be back

Great place to get away for the weekend, literally 3 minutes to the beach. Anat was the perfect host: there to let us in and sharing her baking paper when we needed it ;) Clean and properly equipped, comfortable bed and sun in the morning like in the pictures.

I loved the very funcional kitchen, cause we cook a lot. The adjustment has a ton of light and is super close to the water, which we loved. Warm hospitality! The highest and train are also close, so be forewarned about the noise of that.
Great location, stylish apartment, highly recommended

A cute apartment in a charming Kibbutz. Within a 3-minutes walk you arive at a beautiful wild beach!
Anat is a lovely host. We couldn't ask for more..

Best location in a lovely kibbutz, and 2 minutes walk to the beach. The apartment is super clean , the host was lovely and responsive. We are already planning our next visit there.
Highly recommended!!!

We stayed for almost a week and enjoyed every second. The sea view is fantastic, the accommodation was better than expected and designed in a relaxing way, Anat and Dolev were there for every question/need and did beyond expected in order to make our stay as pleasant as possible (thanks again!).
The beach is within 2 minutes walk and so is the grocery store. We watched the most gorgeous sunsets every night.
VERY RECOMMENDED

מקום נעים ומקסים
ממש קרוב לים

ענת מארחת נהדרת, נעימה וזמינה.
הדירה בדיוק כמו שבתמונות, המרחק מהים באמת 3-4 דקות הליכה.
החוף משגע ומרהיב, שקיעות יפהפיות ותחושה נטושה בקטע טוב.
מקלחת החוץ כיפית ומפנקת והדירה יחסית מאובזרת (אבל אם בונים על משהו ספציפי במטבח כדאי לשאול או להביא מהבית כי זה קצת אקלקטי).
מאוד נקי ומאוד נעים. היו לנו שלושה ימים סופר כיפיים בדירה, בחוף ובאזור בכלל.

מה שכן, החוף הוא חוף לא מוכרז וכדאי להתעדכן מראש במזג האוויר והגלים כדי לא להכנס לים מסוכן ויש מסילת רכבת בין הדירה לחוף ובימים שאינם שבת או חג נשמעת היטב גם מאוחר בלילה ולפנות בוקר.
חופשה מושלמת. דירה מרווחת, נקייה ומצוידת בכל מה שצריך. מרחק הליכה קצרה מהים. חוף נקי וריק. מושלם.

דירה נעימה, נקייה ונחמדה. עם מרפסת נחמדה. הקירבה לים מאד כיפית, חוף מתאים מאד לאוהבי גלישה.
לקחת בחשבון הדירה מאד סמוכה לדירה נוספת באותה קומה.
לי היה מאד כיף

מאוד נהננו מהשהות אצל ענת, המקום ממש קרוב לים נקי מסודר ונעים.
אפשר לראות את הים מהמרפסת, ויש אוירה כפרית שכל כך נהננו ממנה.
התקשורת עם ענת היתה מעולה לאורך כל הדרך.
הגענו ל 10 ימים ואנחנו בהחלט נשוב, מאוד ממליצים.

התארחנו לסופש אצל ענת, נהננו מאוד. היחידה קרובה מאוד לים, חוף יפייפה. האזור מקסים ויש הרבה איפה לטייל ומה לעשות.
הבית קרוב למסילת רכבת, אבל בסופש אין רכבות והיה שקט ונעים.
ענת מאוד נחמדה והיתה זמינה לכל הבקשות והצרכים שלנו. מומלץ בחום

ענת מארחת נפלאה. קיבלה את פנינו בחיוך והייתה זמינה לכל דבר. הדירה עצמה מרווחת מאוד. יש מקלחת חוץ, שאחרי השהייה בים הייתה נהדרת. יש חוף פרטי 2 דקות הליכה מהדירה.
ללא ספק חופשה נפלאה, מחכים בקוצר רוח לפעם הבאה.

מאד נהנינו מהשהייה בבית הנחמד של ענת. הדירה יפה מרווחת ונקיה ומצויידת בכל מה שצריך כדי להרגיש בבית. עם מרפסת יפה.  קרוב מאד לים. מיקום מצויין. קרוב מאד למקומות יפים, נקודת יציאה טובה לטיולים בסביבה. בעלת הבית נחמדה ואדיבה, עזרה ויעצה בכל מה שצריך.
מקום נעים, נקי, קרוב מאד לים. ביליתי שם חופשה קצרה ונעימה.
מיקום מעולה ותמורה מצוינת למחיר

דירה מקסימה, מעוצבת בטוב טעם, מאובזרת ונעימה, קרובה ממש לים

דירה מקסימה עם מיקום מנצח, נקייה ומצוידת בכל מה שצריך עד הפרטים הקטנים. בת זוגתי ואני התארחנו בה לשבועיים ובחלק מהימים למדנו דרך המחשב, לא הייתה בעיה תודות לשקט ולאווירה הנעימה.
המרפסת משקיפה לים שנמצא 2 דקות הליכה מהדירה!
בקיבוץ עצמו לא חסר כלום, יש מרכולית גדולה יחסית ומתקני כושר, וכמובן שענת המארחת דואגת לכל מה שצריך וחסר.

בקיצור יש טעם של עוד ומומלץ לכולם!!

דירה נעימה ומרווחת 3 דקות הליכה מהים. מלאת אור, פרקט בכל הדירה, מטבח נוח ומאובזר עם פינת אוכל, מקלחת נהדרת, מרפסונת מקסימה, מסך טלוויזיה גדול. בילינו בדירה חמישה ימים, בחלקם עבדנו (ווייפיי מצוין, פינת עבודה נוחה) ובחלקם בילינו (הים כל כך קרוב שזה מדהים, חיפה קרובה מאוד). המארחים היו נחמדים וזמינים. המרכולית של הקיבוץ במרחק כמה דקות הליכה ומצוידת להפליא. שומעים את כביש החוף ואת הרכבת מהדירה, לנו זה לא פגם בהנאה :)

מקום מקסים, שקט ונעים. דירה נעימה ויפה עם כל מה שצריך ארבע דקות הליכה מחוף קסום, שקט ויפהפה.
מומלץ בחום

description: 2 room apartment on beautiful Haifa beach. Haifa Promenade below the building and restaurants too. Cable HD FlatTV with channels for kids and different languages support like Russian, free Wi-Fi, Air Conditioner, Fully Equipped Kitchen, Free Parking. Close to bus stop and the train. Easy access to main touristic routs. Fresh linen and towels, free tea, coffee, sugar, etc. Easy access to Yama, Rambam hospital, Carmel Center and Bahai gardens. Near entrance to Carmel tunnels and MATAM.The spaceRenovated apartment with new parquet floor.Big parents room with a new Double Bed and a huge closet and in the other room the sofa could be opened to a bed if needed. 2 Cable HD TV in both rooms with hundreds of channels including kids channels, sports channels and channels in different languages (for example Russian channels).The walls are decorated with beautiful hand-painted oil paintings which gives the place a peaceful feeling. The kitchen is fully equipped including electric stove, stove ventilator, cooking pots, coffee, tea and more.Guest accessYou can use everything that you see in the apartment.Other things to noteThe building is basically the only licensed building in Haifa that is on the beach. It's a huge building with around 300 hundreds rooms and 16 floors. The building has a doorman, small cafe within the building, restaurants, huge balcony, water park right outside the building, sports room, convention room and more.
additional_house_rules: Have Fun :-)
interaction: You can write me in any language that you want. I'll translate and answer you promptly. I'm a rather new host on airbnb. My strategy is to give the best possible customer service in order to receive quick 5 stars feedbacks that will give my guests confidence to continue visiting me. You can ask me questions about Israel and Haifa. If you need recommendations for places to visit, restaurants, places to go out or anything else please feel free to talk to me 24/7.
transit: Bus- to the north of the buildingTaxi- Within the building there is a phone that you only need to pick up (no dialing) and call for a cab.Train- 1.2 km to the south of the building.Car- free parking. The building has easy exit to Haifa main road and Haifa tunnels.Walk- Haifa's beautiful Boardwalk on the beach.

3 of us stayed in eyal's place for a long weekend in haifa. the apartment was in a great location with a beautiful view directly on the carmel beach. the beaches are fantastic and there is a promenade (tayelet) with cafes/ bars/ restaurants along the beach. we found free parking directly in front of the building every day/ night, but there is also a parking garage under the building for a fee if you can't find a spot (the beach gets busy especially on the weekends). the apartment including linens were clean. kitchenette small but very functional for making breakfasts, including a small fridge and hot plate/ stove. super quiet (except the occasional shout from the lifeguards at the beach below, i think they start at 8am?). building and apartment are a bit 'dated' as others have said, but still clean and functional. eyal was a great host with super easy check-in and -out.
Stayed here for a couple of nights and enjoyed the flat. Good communication and great location. Eyal was a great host and would recommend staying here again.
Awesome appartment facing the Mediterranean! Highly recommended!
reviews.response: Thank you so much! Welcome back any time!

reviews.comments: Eyal’s place is great for singles or a small family that comes for a vacation in Haifa. The apartment have one bedroom that Eyal also took care of bringing us a crib, the living room have a sofa bed so 4 of us were comfortably slept there through the night. Downstairs you can find a beautiful promenade with restaurants next to one of the most beautiful beaches in israel. Great location for a vacation.

"OK" for one overnight not more than that.  The building is in need of repair as is the outdoor space.  The view is spectacular and Eval was extremely communicative.   The coffee shop on the main floor was not open during our stay.

Enjoyed our stay at Eyal's 11th floor apartment.  Spectacular views of the beach and the sunsets were incredible.  His communication skills with us were excellent.  The apartment needs a little sprucing up (bathroom) but don't let this sway you from staying here.  Would come back if we were in Haifa as the location has easy access to Tel Aviv, Acre.......

This was a great apartment right on the beach in Haifa. Host was very accommodating to change in timing due to our highly delayed flights. The place was clean and had a great view. We took a beautiful walk on the beach in the morning. Check in and checkout was easy. Great place. Highly recommend.
Great view of the ocean. Great location for visiting Haifa. Accommodations were quite satisfactory. We'd stay there again.
I loved staying at Eyal place. Everything was better than I expected. The view from the window is amazing. Clean and nice touches on the whole apartment. I would definitely stay again at Eyal's.

We had a perfect stay at Eyals place and really enjoyed the time in Haifa.
The apartment is located directly at the beach; the view to the open see is amazing and only a few steps away from the beach and the boardwalk with nice bars and restaurants.
And it takes only a short drive to get to Downtown Haifa the Gardens or the German Colony.
Inside it's spacious, clean and well equipped. Eyal took much effort to provide all the staff to make you feel at home. As the apartment is face to the sea you'll notice the humidity inside and there is some rust here and there, but it's ok.
Eyal is a perfect host, communication was very easy, he answered instantly to all questions, gave us very good advices to were to go and took care.
We can highly recommend Eyals place and it will be our first choice, if we come back to Haifa.

The first thing you see when you enter the apartment is the white and clean design. The second thing is the spectacular view, 11 floors above the blue Mediterranean sea of Haifa. The building and the neighbors are very nice and quiet. Double glazed windows keep the lifeguards' and waves' noise outside (if unwanted). The location is very convenient - within seconds from a very nice beach with lifeguards, public wooden sunshades and a shallow-water area suitable for children. A few minutes away there are some cafes, bars and restaurants. Eyal left us two folding beach chairs which we used on the beach - a nice surprise. The apartment was very clean, yet a little bit run-down. Very hot water in the bath and good air conditioning - both available if you like. The communication with Eyal was excellent. Definitely a pleasant experience.
The location is great and Eyal is a good host. The room like an outdated hotel room, but fine. We enjoyed our stay!

The hotel is about 50 yards from the low entrance to the Baha’I gardens, close to down town Haifa, where there are many entertainment centers, markets and City Center Mall.This is the perfect place for vacation where you can enjoy the Haifa special atmosphere and a great culinary variety.The spaceCity Port Hotel has three types of luxurious modern rooms,Each room includes: AC, cable TV, free internet connectivity, mini fridge, safe and a coffee/tea station.Shower includes toiletry and a hair blow dryerThis room is ideal for a single traveler, whose purpose is just for a vacation or for a business traveler who wants to be close to a business center!Guest accessThe hotel has a beautiful shared balcony with city view.

נעים להיות בפנים ובחוץ, והיה כיף לנוח שם בשלווה.

name: Nanaim Lodge Country Accommodation #1
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Barbecue utensils - Grill, charcoal, bamboo skewers/iron skewers, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Backyard - An open space on the property usually covered in grass
Single level home - No stairs in home
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: A self-contained cottage with master bedroom, sleeping alcove, living room, kitchen and bathroom, and a large front yard adjoining farmland.The spaceIf you're looking for a country atmosphere with the smell of garden herbs and the season's fruits in your yard; if you want to be within an hour's drive of the major attractions along the coast in central Israel; if you're looking for a warm welcome with the chance for the occasional philosophical conversation with your hosts, if you want to drink tea in 7 herbal flavors or more, taste some special olives and our own olive oil, then this is the place for you. Nanaim Lodge at Ein Ayala - 20 minutes south of Haifa, 55 minutes to Tel Aviv, 75 minutes to the Galilee, 5 minutes from the beach, surrounded by banana plantations, with the sea to your left and the Carmel mountains to your right.Other things to note1. Children under two years of age are not counted as extra guests per night but we do charge a one-time fee of 16 Euro for the bed, bedding, etc. ילדים מתחת לגיל 2 אינם נספרים כאורחים נוספים ללילה אבל ישנו תשלום חד-פעמי עבור מיטת התינוק, מצעים, וכו'. י2. The prices are for tourists with a foreign passport who do not have to pay V.A.T. Guests with an Israeli passport must add V.A.T. to the price. .המחירים  באתר לתיירים, ללא מ.ע.מ. תושבי ישראל חייבים להוסיף 17% מ.ע.מ
additional_house_rules: Towels are for use indoors. Beach towels will be provided on request.

reviews.comments: We had a delightful stay at Tamar’s. The garden was perfect- peaceful and relaxing. The bungalow had everything we needed, good beds, a nicely equipped kitchen for simple meals and a very good bathroom. So close to great beaches and Zichron Ya’akov.
A lovely place for a family stay, and Tamar is an excellent host. We had an amazing time
Clean, beautiful location, close by to the beach.

Your stay in Tamars lodge would be fantastic. It is a quiet place, a perfect location between the Carmel and the sea. Tamar and her husband are fast in communication and they give you a warm welcome. You will have a great time in Nanaim lodge!

I stayed 2 nights at Tami’s place. It’s a small private house located on her property behind the main house. Tami is very nice, communication was great. The garden is very nice. The house is simple but cozy. Bed was comfortable. Toilet and shower are clean, but for those of you who enjoy long hot showers you’ll be disappointed as the hot water will last for around 10-12 minutes give or take per shower (electrical heater). Apart from that you’ll find +- everything you’ll need in the house. And I’m sure if you need anything tami will help you out . I had a good time and will probably be back.
Thanks Tami

What a difference great hospitality can make! After a poor experience at our previous Airbnb this was what we really needed. Tamie helped us avoiding the Giro d' Italia and constantly kept contact. At arrival she extensively showed us around and when we mentioned that we would like to BBQ, Stanley immediately brought us all the stuff. What a wonderful welcome! The house is warm, sweet and has a lovely garden with beautiful flowers and plants. The house is equipped with everything you need and you can feel the love that Tamie and Stanley have put into it.. Tamie's herbal tea even made me (as an addicted coffee drinker) drink tea and we would highly recommend this house to everyone who is looking for a relaxed stay closeby the beach, Zichron and Carmel Mountain. It's a shame we could not stay any longer.
Thanks again!
A great place for families
Nice rural location. Quiet and pastoral. Great host. Very clean and comfortable accommodation for 2. Extra amenities, juice, milk and other kitchen products supplied. Really appreciated.
Lovely quiet place. Highly recommended!

We are a family with two small kids (3years & 9 months). We really enjoyed the stay. Very nice house: small, but clean and accurate. Tamar and her husband  tried their best to serve our requirements. They are polite, welcome and pretty easy going people.

We felt at home, the minute we arrived and saw the beautiful garden, the cottage and Tamar herself.
Nanaim Lodge is made for relaxing and to just let your thoughts float away. Tamar is a wonderful host, we loved chatting with her, we liked her tips very much and also the way she decorated the cottage. She has playful dogs ('can i adopt one?'), hugging cats, a lot of tasteful herbs in her garden and the bougainvillea is gorgeous! Her place is a place to relax, therefore, if you want to visit a city you need a car, but we didn't mind that al. If we're in Israel again, we definitely stay here again.
nice
Tamar is very welcoming host. ready to help you in any advise and give you a lot of helpful information. the unit is very clean and have everything you need. Dor beach maybe the best in Israel.
reviews.response: Thanks, Shmuel and Angela, for your warm response. We'd enjoy hosting you again sometime.

reviews.comments: Tamar was very concered that we felt welcome. She helped us in every issue - she is really great. The place is very nice and the apartment is furnished very beautiful and with all what you need.

My husband and I were warmly welcomed by our hosts, Tamie & Stanley. We arrived at the start of the sabbath but had no problems getting to the cottage. We took a sherut from Ben Gurion airport towards Haifa and the driver dropped us off on the way, at the local bus stop called Ein Ayala Branching which is only a short 10 minute walk away to the cottage. Tamie had kept in regular contact with us in the time leading up to our visit & during our travels.  As first-time visitors in Israel, we particularly appreciated Tamie ckecking on our welfare as we were travelling around using public transport (which was relatively easy, comfortable & cheap and we always felt safe). Tamie was also able to give us helpful tips on places to visits. The cottage itself is simply but adequately equipped, as described. With some lovely colours inside and personal touches, it feels cozy & homely. The bed is particularly comfortable, ensuring we awoke refreshed each morning and the shower is great. The cottage, pretty garden and surroundings are in a peaceful location and in a friendly, small & quiet neighbourhood. It's only about a 40 minute, pleasant walk to the nearby beaches and nature reserves which are unspoiled, clean and quiet. The area is great for exploring and if like us, you don't want to hire a car (or if you can't drive),  you can get to other parts of the country from there, with good bus & train connections ( for example, we went to Jerusalem, Tiberias, Nazareth, Akko and Zikhron Ya'akov). The local shop is only a few minutes walk away and sells most everyday things, including fruit and vegetables. It was lovely being able to make a cup of tea with freshly picked herbs from the garden and to taste the delicious olives and olive oil, which our hosts grow & produce on site. To sum it all up: without being intrusive, Tamie & Stanley ensured we had a wonderful stay which felt more like a family visit than a tourist stop-over. Highly recommended. Thanks again Tamie & Stanley!  :-)
A lovely and cosy house, very well located. The hosts were pleasent and most helpful.
Thanks a lot for such a great vacation! The house is very nice and comfortable, with all necessary stuff. And the garden is really charming! We enjoyed our stay very much!
תמר נחמדה בצורה יוצאת מן הרגיל, וזה חשוב בבחירת מקום אירוח. הדירה קטנטנה אך נוחה ושקטה, בקרבת חוף דור/הבונים וזכרון יעקב, ולא רחוקה ממסלולים באיזור הכרמל, רמות מנשה ועוד.

name: Dream rooftop condo near Haifa Stylish & Modern
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
HDTV with premium cable, standard cable
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Cooking basics - Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.
Private entrance - Separate street or building entrance
Luggage dropoff allowed - For guests' convenience when they have early arrival or late departure
Long term stays allowed - Allow stay for 28 days or more
description: Safety comes first! We are doing an extra deep cleaning due to Covid-19 for your safety!Welcome! This brand new spacious top unit condo lets you live like a home away from home, located in the heart of the north of Israel! 7 minutes drive from the sands of Haifa beach! You can watch the sunset on your private rooftop while swinging in a double size hummock or just getting some sun on the tanning bed. This 3 bedroom & 2 bathroom unit comes with all amenities for the best vacation!!!The spaceOur completely modern rooftop condo has all the modern features you’d want and need.The kitchen, dining room, and living room are all one spacious, open, and bright space including smart tv, water bar, Nespresso machine, dishwasher, and even a ping pong table! 2 strong air conditioning for the Israeli hot days and a fire stove to get you warm in the winter. Through the living room, you will reach the side balcony including chairs, coffee tables, and BBQ. All the mattresses and pillows are top quality for the best sleeping experience, since we understand how important it is. The master bedroom has a California king-size bed (2.00\2.00), smart tv with cables, and a large walk-in private glass design shower. The 2nd bedroom is a bright room with double windows and a double bed.The 3rd bedroom has 2 Single bed and a smart tv with cables. The guest bathroom has a shower.My favorite place in the apartment is the 60 meters sunset and sunrise view rooftop!!!Guest accessThe condo is 100% private for you! Lower level gardens are restricted as it is reserved for bottom floor tenants.Free street parking right outside the apartment is available. We're happy to light a fire for you, but please don't do that on your own, head-noticed required.Other things to noteThe condo is further polished with:3 smart tv with cables TV(more than 150 channels)Fast Wifi connection Washer and dryer with no extra feeFresh linens, towels, TOP quality mattresses and pillows. You will feel like boutique hotel.Kitchen with all appliances you’ll need for a home-cooked mealStreetside parking availablePing pong tableFire stove***60 meters rooftop with hummock, tanning bed, comfortable chairs, and table***.And much more!
additional_house_rules:
If you need anything or anything bothers you, please let us know so we will be able to help you and provide the best time we can in our house.

As of the the Security section of the Airbnb Community Standards requested, know that there is a Demo camera outside the front door in the stars is section. Don’t worry this camera isn’t working and it just cause the insurance required us to do so. 

There is free automatic filtered hot/cold water in the kitchen. You are more than welcome to help yourself!

The garden downstairs is not part of our property.. sorry! No entry isnt allowed, you are more than welcome to use the balcony to get some good sun or breath some fresh air. This is also the smoking area.

I will be glad to help you get familiar with the area. There are a supermarket, gym, running area, basketball and soccer facilities nearby. 
The house is located above the metro station to Haifa and Lev Hamifratz.

See you soon!
interaction: self-check-in! I'm always happy to give tips about the area and any place you're interested in visiting. The house is for your convince and privacy and we won’t be around the area unless you will need something.
transit: The location of the listing is perfect right at the entrance of the city so no traffic problems at all, also it is close to public transportation.The neighborhood is super safe and friendly, free parking is available on the street.

reviews.comments: Lad was by far the best Airbnb host I’ve ever experienced. He accommodated our religious requirements, was extremely responsive even though he was in a very different time zone, and he was super friendly and answered all our questions and gave the best recommendations for traveling to the apartment, and for restaurants and supermarkets in the area. The place was squeaky clean with no issues and was FAR better than the pictures portrayed it. Would 100% stay here again! The neighbors were very friendly and street parking was so easy. And the roof was incredible!
Terrific place.  Great showers.    Fantastic bed.  Easy street parking

Beautiful home! The pictures don't do it justice. My husband and I felt very comfortable during our month long stay here. The location is great. Within walking distance to grocery store and local transit. Being from America, I found it quite easy to find my way around. Elad replied quickly to every question we had and was very helpful and courteous. A perfect experience, thank you!

Very convenient and modern.
We’ll equipped.
Good location.
Good communication.

Amazing location first of all,close to the beach,restaurants,supermarket,gas stations transport.
The house are so clean and comfortable,make feeling like home.
Lad was very helpful with everything that we asked for(we didn’t need much the house was ready as hotel)
There is sinagog 15-20 meter from the house
I just loved this place

Lovely big space. First floor. Great kitchen with all the amenities along with oils salts coffee etc so you don’t have to pack every little spice. Air conditioners in every room, a great master bathroom and shower. Didn’t spend anytime on the terrace because it was 35C while we stayed but that was fine.

The house is very close to the main road arteries north east and south. A great base for your travels in the north. Ample parking on the small side street right in front of the house.

5 min walk to a supermarket. There is a small local synagogue directly across the street.

Lad’s place was exactly the property we needed for a night in Kiryat Ata.
Communication was fantastic and Lad was truly accommodating.

The kitchen was fully equip and even had spices and the usual coffee tea+!_ nespresso machine and cleansed water machine.

The rooftop is fantastic and little wooden games await in the living room with a huge TV with hundreds of channels.

All 3 rooms had great sized double beds (one room with a super king) and it was just great.

I’d recommend this property and host anytime. Thanks for having us Lad.
Very cute, spacious... Very close to Haifa and the beach. The the master bathroom/shower and bed are spectacular. Tidy, comfortable, big kitchen area. We enjoyed it!
The place was sparkling clean

Elad is a very nice host and he was available for us all the time. He & his parents were very kind and check to see that everything is fine. Also, elad turn the hot water heater remotely for us when we were not at home.

The house is very spacious, more then in the pictures. The kitchen is very comfortable and well equipped. The parents unit is well designed, and the shower had a great stream, a lot of space and it was indulgent. The couch, bed, sheets and pillows were very comfortable, and are of good quality.
We enjoyed our stay here.
Very nice and spacious apartment

Had great time staying at the apartment.
I traveled by myself with a small baby and it was perfect. Hosts were welcoming and did beyond the call of duty to make our stay pleasant. Tirtza is wonderful and even helped my with my baby .
Apartment is beautiful and very comfortable.

Had a great time at this apartment. Was well equipped and had everything we needed, including fast WiFi, a nespresso machine, aircon in all rooms and black-out blinds. Also enjoyed the private parking as we had a rental car during our stay- although on-street parking was not an issue. Lad was quick to respond and accommodating. Thank you!

התארחנו אצל לד למשך תקופה קצרה. מדובר בנכס מרווח, נקי, מאובזר לעילא ולעילא וענה על כל הדרישות שלנו.  הנכס ממוקם סמוך לכביש ראשי המאפשר לנוע בקלות לכיוון חיפה, עכו נהריה ועוד. כל פניותנו ללד נענו במהירות וביעילות. אנחנו ממליצים להתארח בנכס ולהנות מכל מה שיש לנכס להציע.

A perfect place! Stylish, spacious, well equiped, air-conditioned, clean and in a great location (with car). Lad was attentive and fast to respond. The apartment is better looking than in the pictures and was super comfortable for six people. Will defiantly recommend and come again. Thank you!

אחלה דירה! מעוצבת, מרווחת, מצויידת לחלוטין ומפנקת. נקייה למשעי, והיתה נוחה לנו מאוד מאוד (זוג עם ארבעה ילדים). מיקום מצויין (עם רכב), קרובה לחיפה ונקודת מוצא מעולה לאיזור. אלעד היה זמין ונעים.
אנחנו ממליצים בחום ומקווים מאוד להגיע שוב, תודה!

הדירה מרווחת (מתאימה למשפחה), נקיה ומסודרת. האינטרנט עבד טוב ואיפשר לנו לעבוד מהדירה. מומלץ בחום.
בעל הדירה היה מאוד זמין ובא לקראתינו בכל בקשה.
לא יכולנו לבקש דירה טובה יותר.

הבית פשוט מדהים. בעל הבית דאג לכל פריט כדי שנרגיש בבית.
כל הבית חדש, השירותים מדהימים,הריהוט חדש לגמרי.
המטבח מאובזר ומאוד נוח וכיף לבשל בו.
חלק מהזמן שבילינו בבית היינו בבידוד והגג פשוט הציל אותנו. עם נוף מרהיב, דשא וכל הריהוט. בילינו הרבה שם והילדים ממש נהנו.
מבחינת ניקיון, ממש קשה למצוא מקום בארץ שהוא באמת נקי. וכאן הכל היה נקי, לחלוטין. האמת שהרגשנו קצת בחו"ל ;)
מעבר לבית עצמו, מה שהיה ממש כיף זה היה אירוח החם וזמין. דאגו לנו להכל. מהמלצות למסעדות ולטיולים בסביבה עד להבאת מנורה לילדה שפחדה בלילות. פשוט אין דברים כאלה.
אני בטוח שכל פעם שאזדמן לבוא לצפון זו תהיה הבחירה הראשונה שלי.

האירוח היה נפלא, דירה יפה, מסוגננת, נקיה ומטופחת מאוד.
המארח היה זמין לכל שאלה ובקשה. תודה רבה, אין ספק שנחזור.
מקום נקי מאד וגם יפה מאד. מיקום מוצלח מאד, קרוב לחוף וגם לטיולים בצפון. המארח אדיב מאד, יכלנו לדבר איתו בכל רגע.

+ Квартира большая, кухня полностью укомплектована для полноценного приготовления пищи: плита, духовка, микроволновка и вся необходимая посуда. Фильтр холодной и горячей воды. Во всей квартире 4 кондиционера, удобные кровати, удобные подушки, огромная мягкая кровать в основной спальне, есть бельё, полотенца. Квартира очень чистая. Есть своя парковка на территории дома. Рядом автобусная остановка 2 минуты пешком. Большой супермаркет 8 минут пешком. Своя стоянка с автоматическими воротами. Отец хозяина всегда был готов помочь, сразу помог когда выбило пробки, и заело ключ от замка. Хозяин идет на встречу при решении спорных вопросов.

- Квартира находится на втором этаже таунхауса (это не целый таунхаус), к ней ведет крутая лестница без перил, с ребенком было сложно подниматься и спускаться. На первом этаже живут родители хозяина ( это не указано в описании квартиры)
В первый же день приезда нам сообщили, что протекает основной душ и туалет и что это будет отремонтировано за 2-3 дня, но пользоваться можно. После этого месяц мы пользовались душем и нам постоянно говорили и показывали, как там у них течет все и стены сырые, в итоге нас попросили не пользоваться основной ванной комнатой на 2 недели, после ремонта через некоторое время снова началась протечка, в которой хозяин обвинил нас через службу поддержки, по его словам мы устроили вечеринку и засорили канализацию, что было абсолютной ложью.
Квартира находится у оживленной трассы с одной стороны, а с другой шиномонтаж, который работает с 5 утра, спать особенно с маленьким ребенком невозможно, открыть окна ночью невозможно, очень шумно.
В квартире есть муравьи, мы сообщили хозяину, хозяин предложил капитальную обработку дома или дать средство от муравьев, в итоге ы согласились на средство, сами обрабатывали, но они появлялись снова, ребенка кусали.
Дом находится в религиозном районе у синагоги, что накладывает сильный отпечаток на пребывание, особенно в праздники (нельзя делать шашлык в шабат и т.д.). Также, нельзя делать шашлык на балконе.
Некоторые вещи по фото не соответствуют реальности: на балконе стоит старый палет и рулон газона(но может к вашему приезду будет убран), диван не кожаный, а старый тканевый, при заезде не было сушилки белья, ее по нашему запросу привезли через пару недель.
Есть камера (в зоне стирки белья), напротив входа.

תודה רבה רבה

reviews.comments: Talk about a million dollar view! Aviva’s place has it all. Large, spacious, high ceilings and floor to ceiling windows that allow you to soak up the majestic beauty of Haifa’s shoreline. We experienced a crystal clean apartment with  extra comfortable beds. Aviva was a pleasure to rent from - warm, professional and helpful. Great value and a memorable stay.
Lovely apartment with an AMAZING view, great location, walking distance to many lovely places in Haifa

I have never written a bad review, so I am hesitant to do so now, as Aviva seems like a nice lady. I do have to say that the apartment did not live up to its description, as it was damp, smelled a bit of mildew, and was cold, despite running all the heaters. The location is very good, on Hof HaCarmel, and the view from the living area is nice of the harbor. The jacuzzi in one of the bedrooms was not working, and the glass stove top on the oven shattered during our stay. We had used it to boil water for pasta in one of the pots in the kitchen, turned it off afterwards, yet it shattered in the middle of the night. When we looked up the make and model, it appears that they are often put together inaccurately, and therefore this occurrence is not uncommon. We, unfortunately, disagree with our host as to the accuracy of the amenities, and were disappointed we had to clean up all the glass from the apartment, our luggage, and even our child, as she slept on the couch.
Great view, nice apartment, very spacious, Aviva very helpful !

The view is spectacular the common room is very large
It was great and Aviva went out of her way to be helpful

Great location, scenic views, parking on street was always available, and washer/dryer.
Nice apartment

reviews.comments: Our stay was terrific.  Aviva was very available and communication was easy.  We had some travel difficulties which made our arrival time difficult to predict but she was very accommodating.  In addition, we received a parking ticket which we were unable to interpret.  She also went above and beyond her normal responsibilities and helped us navigate this wrinkle including arranging to facilitate our payment.  We enjoyed the apartment, the location and the magnificent views of Haifa harbor.  We would be happy to stay there again.  Thanks for being a great host.

Aviva's place was beautiful. My family and I were very happy with our stay. Everything was clean and tidy upon our arrival. We enjoyed the jacuzzi especially! Aviva was also very accommodating with early arrival and late departure. Overall, 5/5 stars for our stay in Haifa. Thank you so much! Hope to come again soon. :)

reviews.comments: This bus a lovely apartment with a stunner by view on a street with easy parking.  If you have a car and want to stay on mount Carmel, this is an excellent choice.  The host was responsive, conscientious, and friendly.

Can't use the hot tub past 7pm*
Was hard to get ahold of host. Checked us in 2 hours after time listed, however had made us check out on time instead of adding to the end. Ran out of toilet paper.

Other than that, excellent location near lots of shops and restaurants, and an amazing view of Haifa. House was also clean. Host was friendly as well.

Location is great.
View from apartment is great
Appartment clean and great for four
Amazing location, beautiful apartment and overall experience in the neighborhood.

The property has a wonderful view of the city, air conditioned, washer & dryer, refrigerator, Iron table ect...
The Baha'i garden was not walking distance, but very close to the Carmel center. First day we arrived to Haifa, we left one of our luggage in the train and she helped us to call the train station to find our luggage and get transportation to the train station. This was very helpful for us, because the message center at the train station was in Hebrew. This was the first time we used airbnb and If I were to go back to Haifa, I would use the same property.

My family and I (4 people total) stayed at Aviva's wonderful home for a 2-night weekend. We wish we had the opportunity to stay a few more nights.
She had everything we needed and the addition of the amazing view, fast wi-fi, laundry machine, and Jacuzzi made the place even more spectacular.
AC was provided in each room and the living room, but was barely used because the temperature was near perfect and the windows opened up easily to a nice breeze.
The house was easy to find and within walking distance to the Ba'hai gardens and Carmel center, which had several very nice restaurants.
If we make it back to Haifa we will look to stay at Aviva's house again - a true gem.

I had a great host her name was Aviva
She was very helpful at all times of requests
Everything was great.

Liked my stay overall. Great view and location, but only a limited storage for clothing in one bedroom. A/C is only in bedrooms, not in living room. Shower stall in the corner is 3ft in radius (was to small for me - 6ft 2in & 256lb).
The following are the instructions I got before arrival from owner, so judge for yourself.

"There is a sollar panel on the roof for hot water but now in winter we also put the electricity automate machine to re-warm the water so you need not touch it at all. Only on departing day please put down the red button to stop electricity.
The hot water in the shower, unlike most places, coming from the right side of the water pipe. In order to get to the hot water you have to open the water pipe (right side) let all the cold water go down and when the hot water arrives turn the pipe a bit towards the middle.
In the Jacuzzi the hot water pipe is on the left side like most other places.
Jacuzzi is permitted to use between the hours 7:00 am till 7:00 pm. The Jacuzzi engine creates too much noise for the neighbors that ask to watch TV at night with no environmental interruptions and we respect this need.Stove and oven - To use the gas stove you need 2 hands. With one hand you press the little round spark button and choose one gas button in other hand and push the button in and keep it pushed and turned to the left. When the fire arrives you can stop pushing the spark button but continue a second or two to keep pushed inside the other button till the fire get stabilized.
Air-condition - Please use the air-condition with care. If the air-condition is left to work non-stop , 24 hours and again, they will not survive till the end of your stay. Please whenever you go out to turn off all AC and make sure that they are turned off. Sometimes you push the remote control but the order don't come through and you have to push it again to see that red button appears which mean that the machine is closed up.
Washing machine - You can choose the quick plan or else it might continue each session for few hours (terrible) you have a wire and sticks to catch the wet laundry that will help you dry the laundry. We don't put a dryer to avoid fire.
For any questions i am always available and can come immediately in case of emergency.
If you go towards house number 52 you will find stairs that takes you to a road that goes up to Carmel center with all the shops, banks, post office, great cakes shops, shaworma, falafel, and other interesting israeli food that you might be interested to try. The Yefe-Nof street just above Henrieta Szold takes you to the upper Bahai't shrine and gardens. (amazing)"
The apartment was nice and clean, modern, parking always available, close to Bahai Gardens and gorgeous view of the Bay.   Aviva was sweet and friendly and very helpful.

The flat is beautiful with a wonderful view. There are 2 large and comfortable beds (one in each bedroom) and sofas in the living room. This is a great place for Bahai's who are visiting the Holy places since it is 10min walk to the Shrine and you have a view from the window.
Haifa streets are impossible to navigate with a map (many are one-way and the city is built on a mountain so many don't connect) so definitely have a gps available.

reviews.comments:
This was a great flat, in a really good location. Aviva really helped us out when the airline temporarily lost one of our bags. She was very responsive whenever we had a question. We got a good feeling staying in this flat. Next time we are in Haifa we would definitely try to stay here again.

The flat is clean and well laid out, with two private bedrooms and plenty of space in the living room and kitchen. Both bedrooms have air conditioners that work quickly, and the large windows open up to let in cool air in the evenings.

The view is amazing, and the location is close to shopping and to the Baha'i gardens. A note about shopping: there is a large grocery store a few blocks up hill from the flat. Down hill just has tiny neighborhood food stores. If you are trying to make or pack meals, go up hill. There are restaurants there too, and many other shopping places.

The hills were a bit challenging, it is something you have to be ready for. Haifa seems to be one big hill so wherever you go you have to be prepared for stairs. We counted 413 stairs between this flat and the Baha'i pilgrim house that we went to every day! (It took 20 or 25 minutes to walk there in the morning, downhill.) Of course you can take a taxi (etc.) if the stairs are too much. This will be the case no matter where you stay in this area of Haifa. It was nice to be able to walk to the Baha'i gardens, this flat is closer to them than many of the hotels.

We really enjoyed staying here and appreciated the help Aviva gave us.

We spent four nights in Aviva's lovely apartment. The apartment was sparkling clean and well equipped. The view was spectacular and the location was terrific -- lots of choices for restaurants and shopping. There was ample street parking. Aviva was very responsive and easy to work with, both during the booking process and when we were actually in Haifa. This was our first experience with airbnb, and we were extremely pleased with it!

Aviva's apartment was awesome! The view of the city and harbor was breathtaking from all the large windows and the hot tub in the bedroom! Everything was clean and peaceful in the neighborhood. One warning- it would be very difficult with no car! It's a quiet road on top of the hill and a long steep walk to the corner store. We highly recommend this 2 bedroom apartment in lovely Haifa.
Great place to enjoy Haifa. Within walking distance of shops and cafes and the view was great. Avila may the stay very easy. Apartment was as advertised though the view was even better!
We had great time in Aviva's apartment. It is beautiful, newly remodeled with breathtaking view of Haifa. Everything was just perfect. Thank you, Aviva

My wife and i stayed with our son  for 3 weeks. The apartment was great well situated and with great view. The beds were very comfortable and the place was clean and looked almost brand new. The host was very responsive and accommodating. We enjoyed our stay very much. The neighborhood is very nice and quiet too with street parking always available. We would certainly stay there again on our next trip to Haifa.

Beautiful apartment, modern, best views of Haifa. Our host was very pleasant, friendly. Hot water in the shower took us a while to figure out (combination of solar and regular heater), but it all worked out. Well equipped kitchen, with everything that one might need for a light breakfast and occasional lunch. Overall, great choice for staying in Haifa.

Fantastic location only a 5 minute walk from great restaurants and shopping.  Amazing view of the city and Mediterranean Sea. Clean and comfortable.  Host was very helpful and did some grocery shopping for us since we arrived on Shabbat.  Price was incredible, especially compared to what you would pay in a hotel.

The problem was that she said that has private  parking, and was not, The street at night it is very busy, and was very difficult to park close to the apartment, besides this it is in a Mountain in one direction street so if you can´t park and you pass the apartment you should do a long way to get again to the apartment. But the apartment has a beatiful view, that makes very reconfortable

communication with the host was excellent

We were 6 people (2 adults, 4 children) on a 9-day visit to the Baha'i gardens. This place was perfect for our needs. We rented a car and had no difficulty going up and down the mountain to the pilgrim reception center (there is occasional traffic on Masada street). The hotels in Carmel center are very close to the apartment. The neighborhood was safe. We appreciated the laundry machine and dryer. Easy parking out front. Safe and quiet area. Lovely view from the window.

Compared with other places we have stayed (Nof, G38, Colony), this one was the one we liked the best. We would stay here again.

The place is nice, location is great next to Carmel center. Unfortunately when we stayed here the weather was very bad so we had some issues with hot water, but Aviva was very quick to respond and offered a good solution. The view from the place is amazing.
Great apartment with a fantastic view. Communication was prompt and easy, Aviva was very accomodating.

Very good location.
there are 2 closed BR. Not as the pictures are showing - this was very good for us!
The appt. was clean and comfortable.
The owner was very kind and helpful.
The apartemnt was so comfortable! With an amazing view of the city and the sea. Aviva was available when We experienced some issues with the wifi and quickly she helped me to make it work.
The apartment is bright, clean, well located and even better than in the pictures. Few steps from Bahai gardens, Luis promenade, Zoo, shops, pubs and restaurants. And breathtaking view, of course!

We felt like we are at home!, the apartment is really great. It's clean, bright, has a great panoramic view on Haifa and the sea. There are 2 bedrooms, kitchen and dinning area - a lot of space.
Shower is good, no problems with hot water.
Internet is fast and works well.
The host provided enough linen, towels, crockery etc.
The apartment is situated in the most prestigious area of Haifa and just 5 minutes upstairs to Carmel area with very nice restaurants, shops, supermarkets. It takes about 10-15 minutes to get to the beach by car. It's difficult without a car in Haifa as it lays on the mountain.

Aviva was very responsive and always was in touch with us.
I'd highly recommend this apartment!

The apartment is very nice, clean, well equipped. Orna was very kind and brought an extra set of sheets so we could use the second bedroom as well when we needed it.

The nicest thing about the apartment is the location and the amazing view! And we totally enjoyed the fact that parking was never an issue.

When we left the apartment, there was an issue with the lock not working, and Orna kindly met us at the apartment so we could leave.

If you are staying in Haifa, we recommend you stay here!~

We had a wonderful stay in Aviva's apartment. She was responsive and welcoming and made sure we found the place and had everything we needed. The place was better than it looked on the web sight. Beautiful, clean, well appointed and spacious.
The view is amazing and the neighborhood is very quiet and safe.
Really a wonderful experience!!! Thank you Aviva and Airbnb!

My family stayed at Orna's apartment for three nights and were very pleased with the experience. Great location, beautiful view and the apartment is very clean and well-maintained. Orna was very pleasant and I would highly recommend the apartment!

We stayed with our family of 5 almost two weeks in the apartment. The apartment was very clean, spacious and had a stunning view! Aviva was a very good and easy going host. Next time when we visit Israel we will certainly check if Aviva's apartment is available.

It would be useful to have a car since the center is not within walking distance and Haifa is not a small town. Despite the troubled situation now in Israel we will cetainly come back.
